meanings: (목숨이 끊어지다) die (of/from), (완곡한 표현) pass away[on], (타인에 의해) be killed, (literary) expire, (literary) perish, (lite...

vlive.korean: 아파 죽을 거 같아 - 괜찮아? I am really sick. - Are you okay? 듣기 View video TWICE : [FULL] TWICE SHOWCASE
vlive.english: I am really sick. - Are you okay?

vlive.korean: 죽을 거 같아요 - 누구예요? I think I'm going to die. - Who is it? 듣기 View video AB6IX : [Replay] AB6IX 1ST ALBUM [6IXENSE] SHOWCASE
vlive.english: I think I'm going to die. - Who is it?

vlive.korean: 무슨 죽을 먹고 있게요? What kind of porridge is it? Can you guess? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TWICE] 보이시나요? 울 쯔에게 신이 숨겨 놓은 황금비율의 곡선👏👏(Tzuyu talking about what she ate)
vlive.english: What kind of porridge is it? Can you guess?

vlive.korean: 피곤해 죽을 것 같아요 지금 - 왜죠? I'm so tired that I can die. - Why? 듣기 View video VICTON : 앨리스와 승식나잇💙💛
vlive.english: I'm so tired that I can die. - Why?

vlive.korean: 우리들은 계속 랩을 해 죽을 때까지 컴온! We'll continue to rap until we die. Come on! 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#415. 힙퀸 (스페셜 DJ 마마무 문별 & 솔라 with 마마무)
vlive.english: We'll continue to rap until we die. Come on!
